title: Ariel Winter reveals how she gets her firm derrière as she posts a gym video of herself doing squats
text:
Ariel Winter is known to serve a laugh or two as Alex Dunphy on everyone's favorite sitcom Modern Family.

And she's also been known to serve some major body on red carpets and social media alike.

So Winter took to Instagram Tuesday to demonstrate just how she achieves her firm derrière.

Booty goals: Ariel Winter took to Instagram Tuesday to demonstrate just how she achieves her firm derrière

She posted a video of herself at the gym, doing some intense weighted squats as she stood on two weight benches.

The 21-year-old showed off her taut midriff in a black sports bra and a pair of blue joggers.

She tagged her trainer Mack Fit in the belated 'Motivation Monday' post: 'I am never the most excitedddd person to go to the gym, but feeling healthier and seeing the work you put in pay off really makes it worth it.'

The Phineas and Ferb actress also showed off her Floss skills, demonstrating the popular dance after finishing her set.

Gym bunny: She posted a video of herself at the gym, doing some intense weighted squats as she stood on two weight benches

Tight tummy: The 21-year-old showed off her taut midriff in a black sports bra and a pair of blue joggers

Motivation Monday: She tagged her trainer Mack Fit in the belated 'Motivation Monday' post: 'I am never the most excitedddd person to go to the gym, but feeling healthier and seeing the work you put in pay off really makes it worth it'

Floss queen: The Phineas and Ferb actress also showed off her Floss skills, demonstrating the popular dance after finishing her set

Serving body: She also posted a video to her story as she posed in the gym mirror, showing off the product of her hard work

She also posted a video to her story as she posed in the gym mirror, showing off the product of her hard work.

Winter recently appeared alongside Mariska Hargitay in an episode of the long-running Law and Order: Special Victims Unit.

A huge fan of the show, she took to Instagram with some snaps, captioned: 'I've seen every episode of this show and when I got the email about guest staring in the episode (entitled The Darkest Journey Home) I didn't even need to open it before saying yes.'

Guest star: Winter recently appeared alongside Mariska Hargitay in an episode of the long-running Law and Order: Special Victims Unit

Fan girl: A huge fan of the show, she took to Instagram with some snaps, captioned: 'I've seen every episode of this show and when I got the email about guest staring in the episode (entitled The Darkest Journey Home) I didn't even need to open it before saying yes'

Co-stars: She included a selfie with Hargitay from the set of the New York City-based crime drama series

On location: Winter also posted a photo of herself sporting some gorgeous red hair in one of the NBC show's director chairs

She included a selfie with Hargitay from the set of the New York City-based crime drama series.

Winter also posted a photo of herself sporting some gorgeous red hair in one of the NBC show's director chairs.

Meanwhile, she's been filming the 11th and final season of Modern Family, which she's starred in since 2009.
description: Winter recently appeared alongside Mariska Hargitay in an episode of the long-running Law and Order: Special Victims Unit. She posted photos from the set, posing alongside Hargitay.
